attributes.name: download
attributes.title: Download
attributes.description: The HTML download attribute of the anchor

attributes.name: href
attributes.title: URL
attributes.description: The URL the anchor points to

attributes.name: hreflang
attributes.title: Linked page language
attributes.description: The language of the URL the anchor points to

attributes.name: ping
attributes.title: Ping URLs
attributes.description: A space-separated list of URLs typically for tracking

attributes.name: referrerpolicy
attributes.title: Referrer policy
attributes.description: The amount of referrer information that should be included with requests

attributes.name: rel
attributes.title: Relationship
attributes.description: Space-separated link types indicating the relationship of the linked URL

attributes.name: target
attributes.title: Target
attributes.description: The display target of the URL

attributes.name: type
attributes.title: Type
attributes.description: The linked URL's format using a MIME type

slots.name: start
slots.title: Start slot
slots.description: Contents of the start slot are positioned before the anchor content

slots.name: end
slots.title: End slot
slots.description: Contents of the end slot are positioned after the anchor content
